lead_paragraph: LUBELL--Daniel S. The partners of Hughes Hubbard extend our deepest sympathy to the family of our former partner Daniel S. Lubell. Dan served with distinction as a bankruptcy lawyer in our firm for 28 years and leaves behind many friends and admirers in our firm and among our clients. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  LUBELL, DANIEL S
